title: Choking
brief_description: Covers first aid for choking in a variety of situations, using practical demonstrations and animation to explain procedures. Also covers aspects of self-help and first aid for pregnant women who are choking.
description: Covers first aid for choking in a variety of situations, using practical demonstrations and animation to explain procedures. Also covers aspects of self-help and first aid for pregnant women who are choking.
